text: Cras-sur-Reyssouze is a former commune in the Ain department in eastern France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Bresse Vallons.Arrêté préfectoral ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:Former communes of Ain Category:Ain communes articles needing translation from French Wikipedia Category:Populated places disestablished in 2019
title: Cras-sur-Reyssouze
